name: AVALON7 CASCADE BLACK AND WHITE BANDARIL-SNOWBOARD FACEMASK
description: The AV7Cascade Bandaril was designed by AVALON7 founder and pro rider Rob Kingwill. AVALON7 Bandarils are the most breathable bandanas on the planet. They are made out of our innovative X7 mesh, so you can wear them on the snowiest days over your face and never fog up your goggles. 23in X 23in breathable polyester X7 mesh, dye sublimated, and two sided so you can rock white or black. Upgrade to the RPK3 System and get this bandaril AND our amazing ballerclava underlayer for only $39.95! Just select the second option in the dropdown below. If this product is not available here you can find it at one of the many fine snowboard shops that carry our stuff. Click below to find a shop near you! SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL SNOWBOARD SHOP

They can be transformed from a faceshield to headband to hat to ballaclava and everything in-between. Mesh Tshields are made from our technical breathable X6 mesh fabric. name: DIAMONDWOOD TSHIELD TUBE BY ROB KINGWILL- CONNECT SERIES SNOWBOARD FACEMASK
description: DIAMONDWOOD Tshield tube by AVALON7 founder Rob Kingwill. The Connect Series is our new line of super limited edition Tshields and Bandarils with photo art by Rob Kingwill. Edition of 100 total pieces. DIAMONDWOOD was photographed in Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming. AVALON7 Standard Tshields are warm and breathable tube facemasks made out of our amazing STRETCHSOFT fabric. They are great facemasks to keep you warm when you go snowboarding or skiing. The Tshield can be transformed from a faceshield to headband to hat to ballaclava and everything in-between. If this product is not available here you can find it at one of the many fine snowboard shops that carry our stuff. Click below to find a shop near you! BUY FROM YOUR LOCAL SNOWBOARD SHOP

name: AVALON7 INSPIRACON HIVE BLACK X7 MESH TSHIELD- STANDARD SERIES
description:
This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with park and spring shredding in mind. Shorter and more breathable than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck.

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the heat. Good for flyfishing, summer hiking, and spring shredding! SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

name: COYOTE VS BEAR MESH TSHIELD BY KELLY HALPIN- LEVEL7 ARTIST SERIES
description:
Coyote VS Bear!  Jackson Hole artist Kelly Halpin has captured the timeless rivalry between two legendary creatures in this bright powerful design.

This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with park and spring shredding in mind. Shorter and more breathable than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck.

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the heat. Good for flyfishing, summer hiking, and spring shredding! SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

name: ASCENDERMOD X7 MESH TSHIELD SNOWBOARD FACEMASK BY ROB KINGWILL- LEVEL7 ARTIST  SERIES
description:
This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with park and spring shredding in mind.  Shorter and more breathable than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck.

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the heat.  Good for flyfishing, summer hiking, and spring shredding! SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

Available at finer flyshops as well as here online.

name: WYOMING PRIDE X7 MESH SHORTY TSHIELD SNOWBOARDING SKIING FACEMASK
description:
The Wyoming Pride design is based on the Wyoming state flag and represents independence, equality and mountain life.

This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with park and spring shredding in mind. Shorter and more breathable than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck.

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the heat. Good for flyfishing, summer hiking, and spring shredding! SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

Available at finer flyshops as well as here online.

name: GRAND TETON MESH TSHIELD HIKING FACEMASK
description:
This design is based on a photo of the Tetons at dusk in Grand Teton National Park near Jackson Hole, Wyoming.

This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with flyfishing and spring shredding in mind. Shorter and more breathable than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck.

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the heat. Good for flyfishing, summer hiking, and spring shredding! SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

name: ELK ANTLER CAMO MESH TSHIELD FACEMASK- CONNECT SERIES
description:
This unique elk antler camo was created from a photo of the Elk Antler Arches in Jackson Hole, Wyoming by Rob Kingwill.

This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with flyfishing and spring shredding in mind. Shorter and more breathable than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck.

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the heat. Good for flyfishing, summer hiking, and spring shredding! SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

name: FISH ON! MESH TSHIELD FLYFISHING FACEMASK BY AVALON7 RISING
description:
Fish On!  There is nothing more exciting than finally hooking that big cutty after patiently floating your fly in front of his nose.  Photo shot on the Teton River near Jackson Hole, Wy. 

This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with fishing and being on the river in mind.  Shorter than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck. 

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the summer heat and the sun and bugs stay off of your face.  SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

Available at finer flyshops as well as here online.

name: REEL DEAL MESH TSHIELD FLYFISHING FACEMASK BY AVALON7 RISING
description:
The Reel Deal design was created by Rob Kingwill from a photo of an antique reel that was his father's, and has been used since the 70's.


This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with fishing and being on the river in mind.  Shorter than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck. 

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the summer heat and the sun and bugs stay off of your face.  SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

Available at finer flyshops as well as here online.

name: RISING SAGE MESH TSHIELD FLYFISHING FACEMASK BY AVALON7 RISING
description:
This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with fishing and being on the river in mind. Shorter than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck.

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the summer heat and the sun and bugs stay off of your face. Good for flyfishing, summer hiking, and spring shredding! SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

Available at finer flyshops as well as here online.

name: RIPPLES MESH TSHIELD FACEMASK FLYFISHING TUBE BY AVALON7 RISING
description:
The Ripples Mesh Tshield design is created from a photo of the Snake River in Jackson Hole, Wyoming.

This X7 Mesh Tshield was specifically designed with fishing and being on the river in mind.  Shorter than our full size winter X6 Mesh Tshields so you don't have to deal with so much fabric on your face and neck. 

Made with our ultra breathable X7 mesh so you stay cool in the summer heat and the sun and bugs stay off of your face.  Good for flyfishing, summer hiking, and spring shredding!   SPF 20+

Dye sublimated X7 Mesh, 10 X 12 inch tube.

Available at finer flyshops as well as here online.

name: AVALON7 STANDARD BALLERCLAVA
description:
This is our standard black Ballerclava design.  Perfect for under your hat or helmet on deep pow days or frigid morning sled rides. 

Pretty much the best facemask ever.

Lightweight and breathable StretchSoft material, with no seams around your face to bunch up and leave painful marks when you have your goggles on.

Try out the AVALON7 Double Over Head System! Combine the Ballerclava with one of our more breathable mesh Bandarils or Tshields to create the world's best powder day facemask system.

name: DRAGON BALLERCLAVA BY SAGE CATTABRIGA-ALOSA
description:
The Dragon Ballerclava was designed by Level7 skier Sage Cattabriga-Alosa.  Look close and you can see the eyes and horns on the sides and nostrils on the front.

AVALON7 balaclavas are super soft and lightweight- perfect for layering under a helmet or hat on the deepest of days skiing or snowboarding.  We call them Ballerclavas 'cause they are baller!

AVALON7 STRETCHSOFT material.  One size fits all.

Look for it in the new movie Art of Flight.

Level7 limited edition of 300.

name: AVALON7 FLEECE NECKGAITER
description:
This high quality fleece neckgaiter will keep you warm on the coldest of days.  Shred the mountain during huntin' season with confidence.
Hunter Orange only.  One size fits everyone but people with huge heads or necks.

name: AVALON7 SILICONE SKATEBOARDING BELT- BLUE
description:
AVALON7 silicone belts are the lightest, most waterproof shred belts we have ever made.  They are bombproof, slightly stretchy, and smell like CANDY.  Yes.  They smell like candy!

These belts are also great for traveling- they are all silicone with a plastic buckle.  No metal means you can keep your belt on and your pants won't fall down when you walk through security at the airport.

There is a small INSPIRACON on the front of the belt and the inside is screenprinted with the main principles of the ACTIVATE Technique to remind you to CENTER FOCUS and FLOW every time you put your pants on.

Each belt comes in a sweet plastic box with the Inspiracon on the outside. 

Available in Black, Blue, Pink, Purple and Green.

Hands down the best belt for snowboarding and skiing ever.


ATTENTION: THE AVALON7 ONLINE STORE WILL BE CLOSED UNTIL APRIL 21, 2013 WHEN KINGER RETURNS FROM FILMING IN ALASKA.  FOR EMERGENCIES PLEASE EMAIL KINGER@AVALONSEVEN.COM  THANKS!

name: AVALON7 DYMAXION BEANIE-SHORT
description:
Extra soft and well fitting, the AVALON7 Dymaxion Beanie will keep you warm and looking good all winter long. 100% Acrylic. Inspiracon tag.

Comes in Black, White, Yellow, Red, Light Blue, Grey, Flourescent Pink  Purple, and Kelly Green.

name: AVALON7 DYMAXION BEANIE- LONG
description:
Extra soft and extra long AVALON7 Dymaxion Beanie will keep you warm and looking good all winter long.  100% Acrylic.

This is the 12 inch long version.  Comes in Black, White, Yellow, Red, Light Blue, Grey, Flourescent Yellow and Purple.

name: AVALON7 SMOKESTACK VISOR BEANIE
description:
This super warm visor beanie has mad style.
100% Acrylic.

name: AVALON7 TSHIRTS AND HOODIES
description: Tshirts and Hoodies are available through the AVALON7 ARTSPROJEKT STORE Just click here: GO TO THE AVALON7 ARTSPROJEKT STORE

name: AVALON7 INSPIRACON STANDARD TSHIRT
description:
Rock the Inspiracon loud and proud.



ATTENTION: THE AVALON7 ONLINE STORE WILL BE CLOSED UNTIL APRIL 21, 2013 WHEN KINGER RETURNS FROM FILMING IN ALASKA.  FOR EMERGENCIES PLEASE EMAIL KINGER@AVALONSEVEN.COM  THANKS!

name: AVALON7 POSITIVE VIBRATION TSHIRT
description: Feel the positive vibration!  Activate the upward spiral with this tshirt.

name: AVALON7 LEVEL7 HOODIES
description: Tshirts and Hoodies are available through the AVALON7 ARTSPROJEKT STORE Just click here: GO TO THE AVALON7 ARTSPROJEKT STORE

name: AVALON7 EYE OF THE BEHOLDER TRUCKER HAT BY ROB KINGWILL- LEVEL7 ARTIST SERIES
description:
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.  Behold.  The Beholder Trucker hat.  There is an eye in there somewhere.

This graphic was hand drawn by Rob Kingwill on his most recent trip to Alaska while waiting for the weather to clear.

This Cobra trucker hat was dye sublimated by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

The super breathable mesh makes this hat great for summer!

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 TETON PASS CONNECT TRUCKER HAT BY ROB KINGWILL-CONNECT SERIES
description:
The Pass Connect Trucker Hat design was photographed one snowy day on top of Teton Pass in Jackson Hole, Wyoming by Rob Kingwill.

This Cobra Trucker hat was dye sublimated by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

The super breathable mesh makes this hat great for summer!

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 TETON SPRING TRUCKER HAT BY ROB KINGWILL- NATIONAL PARK SERIES
description:
This photograph was taken at the Blacktail ponds in scenic Grand Teton National Park near Jackson Hole Wyoming by Rob Kingwill.

This Cobra Trucker hat was dye sublimated by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

The super breathable mesh makes this hat great for summer!

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 TETON DUSK BY ROB KINGWILL- NATIONAL PARK SERIES
description:
This photo was taken after a late evening jump session near Teton National Park by Rob Kingwill. Part of our new National Park Series.

This Cobra Trucker hat was dye sublimated by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

The super breathable mesh makes this hat great for summer!

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 OPTIMISTIC SNAPBACK MESH HAT
description:
Being OPTIMISTIC is at the very core of the AVALON7 philosophy.  Afterall, we are FUTUREPOSITIV!

Check out the Optimists Creed by Christian D Larsen here: 
http://www.avalonseven.com/avalon7/the-optimist-creed/

This Yupoong Classic snapback hat was hand printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

The super breathable mesh makes this hat great for summer!

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 STOKED MESH SNAPBACK HAT
description:
This easy breezy mesh snapback will compliment your unique style and express your innermost STOKED feeling.

Hand printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

Edition of not a lot.

name: AVALON7 ROAM BISON SNAPBACK HAT
description:
The iconic Wyoming State Flag was the inspiration behind the Roam logo.  

Hand Printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY on high quality Yupoong Classic Snapback hats.

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 OPTIMISTIC SNAPBACK CANVAS HAT
description:
Being OPTIMISTIC is at the very core of the AVALON7 philosophy. Afterall, we are FUTUREPOSITIV!

Check out the Optimists Creed by Christian D Larsen here:
http://www.avalonseven.com/avalon7/the-optimist-creed/

This Yupoong Classic snapback hat was hand printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

All canvas snapback looks great at parties!

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 DEF LOGO SNAPBACK HAT
description:
AVALON7 is a mythical city from the future, sent back in time to help us to become FuturePositiv.

It symbolizes bright hope for the future and represents those who are Unique, Positive and Conscious.

This snapback hat was hand printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

name: AVALON7 AK CONNECT TRUCKER HAT BY ROB KINGWILL-CONNECT SERIES
description:
The graphic on this trucker hat was designed while Rob Kingwill was staying in an RV at Tailgate Alaska.  The original photo of the mountains was taken in the mountains of Thompson Pass, deep in the backcountry, in a zone only accessible by helicopter.

Dye sublimated on high quality Cobra trucker hats.

Printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 COYOTE WARRIOR TRUCKER HAT BY KELLY HALPIN- ARTIST SERIES
description:
This amazing design by Level7 Artist Kelly Halpin depicts a scene from a classic Native American story- The Bear and the Coyote.

Dye sublimated on high quality Cobra trucker hats.

Printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 BEAR WARRIOR TRUCKER HAT BY KELLY HALPIN- ARTIST SERIES
description:
This amazing design by Level7 Artist Kelly Halpin depicts a scene from a classic Native American story- The Bear and the Coyote.

Dye sublimated on high quality Cobra trucker hats.

Printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

Edition of not very many.

name: AVALON7 BISON WARRIOR TRUCKER HAT BY ROB KINGWILL-LEVEL7 ARTIST SERIES
description:
The Bison Warrior design was hand drawn by snowboarder Rob Kingwill.  Wild bison once roamed the West by the thousands.  Their numbers have been dramatically diminished, but their beautiful and powerful spirit lives on in those that remain in Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks.

Dye sublimated on high quality Cobra trucker hats.

Printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

Edition of not very many.

name: LOVELIFE SNAPBACK HAT
description:
At AVALON7 we love life, and work everyday to live it and love it to its fullest.  That's why we made this LOVELIFE design.

Handprinted by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, Wyoming on Yupoong Classic Snapbacks (the best!)

name: FALLFIRE TRUCKER HAT BY ROB KINGWILL
description:
Connect series trucker hat designed by Rob Kingwill.  

Original photograph from Jackson Hole, Wy, digitally arranged by RK.

Dye sublimated on high quality Cobra trucker hats.

Printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole, WY.

Edition of not very many.

name: JACKSON HOLE MESH SNAPBACK HAT
description:
AVALON7 was born an raised in Jackson Hole, Wyoming.  

It is a place of rugged beauty, and fierce independence.  

Qualities we hope you will find in all of our products, including this rad snapback hat.

Hand printed by snowboarders in Jackson Hole.

Resort Series by AVALON7

options.name: JACKSON HOLE SNAPBACK- RED BLACK MESH

name: AVALON7 WYO PRIDE TRUCKER HAT
description:
AVALON7 is based in Jackson Hole, Wyoming.  There are lots of buffalo here.  Roam....

Based on the Wyoming State Flag.

Colors are always changing.

options.name: WYO PRIDE MESH SNAPBACK-BLACK ON WHITE
WYO PRIDE SNAPBACK- WHITE PRINT ON BLACK
WYO PRIDE TRUCKER HAT- BROWN AND GOLD
WYO PRIDE TRUCKER HAT- GREY AND BLACK

name: AVALON7 LET'S PARTY! TRUCKER HAT
description:
Foam trucker hat with Let's Party logo and AVALON7 sewn tag.

LET'S PARTY!  Nuff said.

name: AVALON7 ROAM TRUCKER HAT
description: The American Bison is one of the most powerful animals in the world.  They once roamed the American west by the millions. Designed by Kinger.   Hand pressed in the Level7 Studio by snowboarders.

name: AVALON7 SIDESCRIPT TRUCKER HAT
description: Rock the Inspiracon with this trucker hat designed by KINGER.  Hand pressed by snowboarders in the Level7 studio.

name: AVALON7 PARTY! TRUCKER HAT
description:
This trucker is down to PARTY! 

Party! logo with AVALON7 patch and hand sewn tag.

name: AVALON7 DOUBLE UP TRUCKER HAT
description: Rock the Inspiracon with this design by Kinger.  Hand pressed by snowboarders in the Level7 studio.

name: AVALON7 INSPIRACON RISING TRUCKER HAT
description: HI-YAH!   Feel like a ninja with the new Inspiracon Rising trucker hat by Kinger.  Hand pressed in the Level7 studio by snowboarders.

name: AVALON7 CHECHE CAP
description: This AV7 military style hat is clean and simple.

name: MEDIUM AVALON7 DIECUT STICKER PACK- 5PCS
description: Wake up and be AWESOME! This sticker pack includes 5 die-cut AVALON7 Inspiracon stickers in various colors.  Hand crafted in the Tetons!   3.5 x 3.5 inches.

name: LARGE AVALON7 DIE CUT STICKER 7 INCHES
description:
This is the hard to get large size AVALON7 Inspiracon diecut sticker.  

Perfect for the nose or tail of your board.  Wake up and be Awesome!  

Handcrafted in the Tetons!

6X6 inches.

name: LARGE AVALON7 BISON DIE CUT STICKER 7X5 INCHES
description:
Based on the Wyoming State Flag, this classic AVALON7 sticker design lets you rep the power and wisdom of the ancient bison tribes. 

Available in black white and red.  7 X 5 INCHES

Handcrafted in the Tetons!

name: "WISDOM OF THE TREES" PRINT BY ROB KINGWILL
description:
"Wisdom of the Trees" fine art print from the CONNECT Series by Rob Kingwill.  

Photographed and manipulated on the hike up Glory Bowl on Teton Pass, Wyoming.

Laminated and mounted on black foam core board.

name: "THE QUICKENING" PRINT BY ROB KINGWILL
description:
"The Quickening" fine art print from the CONNECT Series by Rob Kingwill.  

Photographed and manipulated in Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming.

Laminated and mounted on black foam core board.

Available in 6X6, and 12X12 inch sizes.

name: "RIME AND REASON" PRINT BY ROB KINGWILL
description:
"Rime and Reason" fine art print from the CONNECT Series by Rob Kingwill.  

Photographed and manipulated on the hike up Glory Bowl on Teton Pass, Wyoming.

Printed on Epsom acid free paper.  Unframed.

Available in 6X6, and 12X12,  18X18 sizes.
